ibm.title: AI Sol.'s Go to Market
ibm.content: My internship at IBM working with four designers to build early designs for a future company offering. Pieces of the project are under NDA until market release.

dino.title: Dino Land
dino.content: Play as a dinosaur breeder in this DOM-based autoclicker. Programmed entirely in HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JS, See if you can build an everlasting dinosaur-based empire!

pokedex.title: Web App Pokedex
pokedex.content: Ever have an inexplicable desire to learn about a pokemon but don't know where to start? Try out my online pokedex! This two week project was designed to help me learn web API use.

pitch.title: Dino Land Pitch
pitch.content: A precursor to Dino Land, this website pitches the initial idea for a 2D party game to be developed in PixiJS, however, the concept shifted into Dino Land prior to production.
